title: Refund problems
body: So I just bought darius for 4800 IP and i unlocked his dunkmaster skin for free via skin shard that I had in my loot. I want to now refund darius but it will not let me. I have 1 refund token

replies.body: It's not possible to use a refund token if you have a skin for that champion.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we can help you out individually with this.  We'll reply back asap!
